participant_1.background:
I love my cat, he's always there to greet me after a workout.
both my parents are creative.
i am currently trying to open my own grocery store.
i watch jimmy fallon s show every night.
i go to at least 10 concerts a year.

participant_2.background:
I start my day early, walk my dog, and then work on my tasks until late at night, listening to music about animals.
My first cup of coffee in the morning is the best part of my day.
i am divorced.
I enjoy my tea while I am working on my goals, and it helps me stay focused and productive.
Last year I moved into a new home that perfectly fit my needs.

content.text: Hey there! How's your day going?
Hey! My day is going great! How about yours?
It's going good! I'm just hanging out with my cat, watching Jimmy Fallon.
Cats are great! I have a dog and a cat. They're both pretty cool.
That's awesome! What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever. She's really sweet and loves to play fetch.
I love golden retrievers! They're so friendly.
Yeah, they're great dogs. What kind of cat do you have?
I have a tabby cat. He's kind of aloof, but he's really cute.
Tabby cats are cute! I've always wanted one.
They're pretty great. What's your favorite thing to do with your dog?
I love to take her for walks in the park. She loves to run around and explore.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love taking my cat for walks too.
It's great exercise for both of you!
